# VSAccountAccessStatus.denied

**Case**

The user denied the app access to subscription information.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Statuses

- **VSAccountAccessStatus.granted**: The user allowed the app to access subscription information.
- **VSAccountAccessStatus.notDetermined**: The user hasn’t chosen whether to allow the app to access subscription information.
- **VSAccountAccessStatus.restricted**: The app isn’t allowed to access subscription information.
